sentence: There are a couple of slight problems the breakfast can be a little hetic and the gym is poorly placed and the equipment is limited but I can highly recommend it
You had to ask in advance for the front desk to turn on the sauna and steam room
There are two nearby golf courses
indoor pool outdoor pool area and furniture etc some instructions sheets on walls eg health spa are very out of date etc etc
Also the accident did limit the activities we had planned

Unfortunately the pool is not usable due to a lot of wind and a lot of noise people playing beach tennis in the polBe aware that the village Sagres is nothing special very windy without proper center and historic heart
We decided to try this hotel as it had a pool so it would give us an activity when we were based in the hotel

Facilities The outdoors pool was out of action due to the renovations the indoor pool was in bad condition and in need of a good clean quite slimy and had missing tiles etc showers in the pool and sauna changing rooms were not working
Sauna too small towels for sauna only on request at the front desk which is miles away we did not really understand why the don´t place some towels at the spa directly
Disappointed that with no mention while booking or on arrival that the spa and indoor pool complex is closed for renovations
Great location friendly staff nice amenities heated pool sauna good breakfast
Excellent breakfast nice view to the sea a good sauna and a nice pool area
Nice facilities inside and outside pool sauna gym
While staying here we LOVED the delicious breakfast and complimentary workout classes
Gorgeous spacious hotel with an incredible view and a gorgeous pool and gym for post surf stretching
Una maravilla de hotel spa sauna baño turco ideal
The facilities are wonderful gym indoor pool outdoor pool with bar kids room garden
Decent and reasonably priced spa services
The outside heated pool the magnificent view the spa the great breakfast in the morning
Great hotel terrible spa experience
